definitions.definition: A group or set of four people or things .

A type of four-dimensional hypercomplex number consisting of a real part and three imaginary parts (real multiples of distinct, independent square roots of −1 denoted by i , j and k ); commonly used in vector mathematics and as an alternative to matrix algebra in calculating the rotation of three-dimensional objects.

main_definition: A group or set of four people or things .
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) A type of four-dimensional hypercomplex number consisting of a real part and three imaginary parts (real multiples of distinct, independent square roots of −1 denoted by i , j and k ); commonly used in vector mathematics and as an alternative to matrix algebra in calculating the rotation of three-dimensional objects.
